fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.description: A story of hope and friendship in a prison.

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind wreaking havoc on Gotham.

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: A series of intertwined stories in the criminal underworld.

fields.title: Schindler's List
fields.description: The story of Oskar Schindler, who saved Jews during the Holocaust.

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology.

fields.title: Fight Club
fields.description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club.

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.description: A man with low intelligence witnesses key moments in American history.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.description: A computer hacker learns the truth about his reality.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fields.description: A hobbit embarks on a journey to destroy a powerful ring.
